content: ï»¿ SJTU-ReThinkLab ä¸æµ·äº¤éå¤§å­¦äº¤æ³å®éªå®¤ Looking for full-time assistant researcher, post-doc, phd candidates, initiative (high GPA/proved research capability -- but NOT must) undergraduates, who are interested in machine learning and applications like (but NOT limited to) autonomous driving, quantum AI, crypto, combinatorial solvers, EDA, dexterous hand, and AI4Science. Please send me resume via yanjunchi AT sjtu.edu.cn. Update: we are also working on something -1->0, 0->1: new (e.g. quantum/pde-inspired) LLM architecture, new scaling law, formal methods for inference and scale up. Try to talk to me! Also feel free to contact me if you feel qualified to serve as a reviewer for TPAMI, PR, etc. Welcome to visit our x.com page SJTU-ReThinkLab ä¸æµ·äº¤éå¤§å­¦Rethinkå®éªå®¤ Junchi Yan Professor (tenured), Fellow of IAPR/IET/AAIA/NAAI Faculty of SJTU AI School & CS School (affiliated) Founding Program Director of Zhiyuan AI Elite Class Founding Assistant Director of SJTU MoE Lab of AI Founding Assistant Director of SJTU AI School Former Principal Researcher with IBM Research Former Affiliated Researcher with AWS AI Lab Visiting Professor of NII Japan, MBZUAI Board Member of ICML (first in mainland) Founding Vice Secretary of AI4Science Union Founding Board Member of SH Quantum AI Union Area Chair for ICLR/ICML/NeurIPS/CVPR/KDD etc. Associate Editor for TPAMI/TMLR/TOPML/PRJ Reviewer for Nature Comm./PNAS Nexus etc. Minhang Campus Former Administrative Building Xuhui Campus AI School Building School of Artificial IntelligenceSchool of Computer Science (affiliated)Zhiyuan College (affiliated)Shanghai Jiao Tong University Homepage visit history since May 2, 2018: Recent news â 2025/12 I give a keynote talk at CCF-CHEC2025 2025/11 I serve as Action Editor for TMLR 2025/11 Three papers (oral 1st authored by undergrad.) were accepted by AAAI 2026 2025/11 Congrats.
